xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} ################################ ## Display an <option> line ################################ #macro(displayLine $themeDoc) #set($fullName = $themeDoc.fullName) <option value="$fullName"#if ($fullName.equals($value)) selected="selected"#end>$themeDoc.plainTitle</option> #end ################################ ## Display lines for a skin ################################ #macro(displaySkinLines $themes $name) #if(!$themes.empty()) <optgroup label="$name"> #foreach($themeDoc in $themes) #displayLine($themeDoc) #end </optgroup> #end #end ################################ ## Displayer ################################ {{html}} #set($xclass = $object.getxWikiClass()) #set($values = $xclass.get($name).getListValues()) #set($flamingoThemes = []) #set($colibriThemes = []) #foreach($theme in $values) #set($themeDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($theme)) #if($themeDoc.getObjectNumbers('FlamingoThemesCode.ThemeClass')>0) #set($discard = $flamingoThemes.add($themeDoc)) #else #set($discard = $colibriThemes.add($themeDoc)) #end #end <select name="${prefix}${name}" id="${prefix}${name}"> #if ($editor != 'globaladmin')<option value=""#if ("$!value" == '') selected="selected"#end>---</option>#end #displaySkinLines($flamingoThemes, $services.localization.render('admin.colorthemes.flamingothemes')) #displaySkinLines($colibriThemes, $services.localization.render('admin.colorthemes.colibrithemes')) </select> {{/html}} {{/velocity}}
